subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Oliver Pérez kept the Mets in the game long enough for their revived offense to roll to a 12-5 victory over the Cardinals and even the N.L.C.S. at 2-2.
snippet: Oliver Pérez kept the Mets in the game long enough for their revived offense to roll to a 12-5 victory over the Cardinals and even the N.L.C.S. at 2-2.
